My explanation:

1. MC's mom is slut and like BBC 

2. MC's is a paranoid af and is hallucinating the whole time, as it shows in the story MC takes pills for his disorder or something. And in the story he suspects that the black guy(Or English tutor) is fucking his mom so he stops taking the pills to investigate but this backfired because in the end he passes out from not taking his meds and wakes up in the hospital. And in the end it's also revealed that the black guy wasn't actually an English tutor but is actually MC's Caretaker because he has a disorder NOW this reveal further backs up this theory of "MC is a paranoid hallucinating lil' bitch". BUT IN THE END, MC starts passing out again in the hospital because he got overwhelmed with the reveal, THEN the black guy gives a sinister "SHUSH" towards to MC as he fades away 1/2

Koreans love their NTRs, but in a different way. You know what I mean if you read some webtoon comics, they got NTR everywhere and everything is seen as just normal. In the end though it is usually those fake vannila ending where the guy only pick one and does not care how much this hoe have been plowed

Reasons for NTR part 3. The last 2 reasons are the other empathic routes. b) empathize with the dude who steals the girl. You are the one breaking the will of another person, giving them something so tempting they lose themselves AND ruins another person's life. Now why you would go this route probably has to do with the euphoric feeling of being in control and essentially giving someone a power trip that they also lose (or never had) any morals in objectivly ruining a person's life. Maybe said reader wishes they could be like that. last but not least C (aka me) you think both character's are stupid or trash and compartmentalize and just imagining youre the one fucking a women and and making her feel that much pleasure. Essentially detach the scenario and just see a woman getting the dog shit fucked out of her and loving it. 
All of these are not mutually exlusive but can be a bit of each category (C in of itself is a hybrid) but ya there are my thoughts

Reasons for NTR pt 2.
Now the next points are where people usually get hung up on (and Not gonna lie, i had some conflicting issues with this at one point)
a) If you empathize with the dude who gets betrayed: This is the the defacto POV of people who say "All cucks must die" or "why do  you like this shit" If you empathize and feel bad for the guy then NTR is really tough, and ya its kinda odd but at this point why do people like feeling this begrudging emotion? well the same reason people like Roller coasters/Things that give an adrenaline rush or like watching sad movies, There is a thrill in feeling a strong emotion with out having to actually be in danger/without consequence. Mofos who skydive are nuts but people dont hate them. Also its been proven that feeling strong emotions have a cathardic effect, kinda giving a person some momentary calrity after said emotions. The rollercoaster/sad movie comparison helped me understand it

People put here coming up with crazy theories here but it's actually pretty simple. The kid has schizophrenia, he shows faulty perception, inappropriate actions and feelings, withdrawal from reality and personal relationships into fantasy and delusion. It also explains why he's taking pills and the longer he goes without them the worse it gets, also why he has a caretaker who lives near by. Everything that just happened was a figment of his imagination because of the lack of medication.
